column1: Kata Robata////Excellent sushi. I cannot think of any other place that serves better (yes
column4: I didn't like their sushi...a rep there suggested to me it got sent out incorrectly when I was there
column5: and Kubo's is currently closed). Their specials and non-sushi dishes are almost always excellent (I had a roasted carrot and coconut foam special that was underwhelming and a bit confusing - a sweet foam with carrots? - but have otherwise have loved them). Best seaweed salad I've ever had
column6: even though it's completely different from the standard seaweed salad typical of sushi places. The fact that their specials are *always* changing keeps things fresh (NPI).
